scripts.build:mastra: npx --yes mastra build -r my-mastra-app && echo 'Mastra build completed'
scripts.build:function: rm -rf appwrite/functions/agent-endpoint/.output && npm run build:mastra && rm -rf my-mastra-app/.mastra/output/node_modules && cp -R my-mastra-app/.mastra/output appwrite/functions/agent-endpoint/.output
